Dr# Faust I suggested $6000 figure, and from what parts
of 194,000 sum would come. Strictly confidentially. I know he'd be

Therefore, I feel he 11 approve and will get request under way next
weeK #
If. difficult to give true, accurate appraisals in letters
sometimes, but above seems best I can do now. In other words. I
feel encouraged about future; I'm not Polyannish.
Regards,
CC: Skornia
Frank E. Schooley

of dangers
